content.prompt: How does the rhetorical question in lines 17-18 of the final stanza (“Where . . . West?”) function in the poem as a whole?

choices.label: It repeats the question posed in the first stanza.
It extends the geographical imagery of the second stanza.
It proposes a better world than the real one.
It disrupts the poem’s pattern of rhyme.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain the function of structure in a text.
